channel.title: Need help running my server
channel.description:
Alright, I'm pretty sure this is an error, but I've followed the instructions in a tutorial to the letter. When I try to run my server, it comes up saying:
[code]Starting PartyScape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555[/code]
And it never loads. For one thing, my port is supposed to be 43594, and the 0.0.0.0 I can only assume is supposed to be the IP address. How can I fix this?
By the way, I am using the PimpScape source.

item.title: Need help running my server
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

The port may also be set in a .ini configuration file.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running my server
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Alright I did compile, and the server still doesn’t run. I’ve changed the port to 43594 in the server file, but yeah. Not working. Either I’m an idiot, which I probably am, or I’m missing something.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running my server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

It isn’t an error, it’s a running message.

Edit: Have you compiled?

0.0.0.0; This is the local port in which you, and you only can connect on.
5555; This may not be your port, but check your server.java file, and search for that message, it may just be that the previous owner set it to just say 5555, instead of having it on the port variable.

Read full topic
